adsController.homestring: More than 10,000 Movies & Shows to Enjoy for FREE!

NextContent.textcontent: With CineVision you will have access to more than 10,000 HD Movies and Series for FREE!
You can easily download a stream that you like for offline watch
You can enjoy an uninterrupted flow of streaming, as it is FREE!
Besides Movies and Series, you can also watch Live Sport Events
Access streams with High Quality synced Subtitles in Multiple languages
To add a movie to your favorites list, click SAVE under the stream player
WatchTogether feature to watch with your friends at the same time (BETA)
Fast and various watching servers that you can switch between whenever you want
User-friendly interface to make sure you enjoy your experience
Ability to use a local-external subtitle (must be .srt extension file)
Stop paying heavy subscriptions and enjoy your favorite Movies for FREE!
New Films & Series everyday with the updated content 24/7
To get notified of new episodes, activate the notification option from settings
With screen-cast feature you can easily cast the stream to your SMART TV
New podcasts every week in different topics, with the listen mode
Family-control option to choose the types of content you can watch
